verses.verse: Remember <S%H2142><s%>, O Lord <S%H3068><s%>, what is come upon us <S%H5027><s%>: consider, and behold <S%H7200><s%> our reproach <S%H2781><s%>.
Our inheritance <S%H5159><s%> is turned <S%H2015><s%> to strangers <S%H2114><s%>, our houses <S%H1004><s%> to aliens <S%H5237><s%>.
We are orphans <S%H3490><s%> and fatherless <S%H369><s%>, our mothers <S%H517><s%> are as widows <S%H490><s%>.
We have drunken <S%H8354><s%> our water <S%H4325><s%> for money <S%H3701><s%>; our wood <S%H6086><s%> is sold unto us <S%H935><s%>.
Our necks <S%H6677><s%> are under persecution <S%H7291><s%>: we labor <S%H3021><s%>, and have no rest <S%H5117><s%>.
We have given <S%H5414><s%> the hand <S%H3027><s%> to the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%>, and to the Assyrians <S%H804><s%>, to be satisfied <S%H7646><s%> with bread <S%H3899><s%>.
Our fathers <S%H1><s%> have sinned <S%H2398><s%>, and are not <S%H369><s%>; and we have borne <S%H5445><s%> their iniquities <S%H5771><s%>.
Servants <S%H5650><s%> have ruled <S%H4910><s%> over us <S%H6561><s%>: there is none that does deliver us out of their hand <S%H3027><s%>.
We get <S%H935><s%> our bread <S%H3899><s%> with the peril of our lives <S%H5315><s%> because <S%H6440><s%> of the sword <S%H2719><s%> of the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>.
Our skin <S%H5785><s%> was black <S%H3648><s%> like a oven <S%H8574><s%> because <S%H6440><s%> of the terrible <S%H2152><s%> famine <S%H7458><s%>.
They ravished <S%H6031><s%> the women <S%H802><s%> in Zion <S%H6726><s%>, and the maids <S%H1330><s%> in the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>.
Princes <S%H8269><s%> are hanged up <S%H8518><s%> by their hand <S%H3027><s%>: the faces <S%H6440><s%> of elders <S%H2205><s%> were not honored <S%H1921><s%>.
They took <S%H5375><s%> the young men <S%H970><s%> to grind <S%H2911><s%>, and the sons <S%H5288><s%> fell <S%H3782><s%> under the wood <S%H6086><s%>.
The elders <S%H2205><s%> have ceased <S%H7673><s%> from the gate <S%H8179><s%>, the young men <S%H970><s%> from their music <S%H5058><s%>.
The joy <S%H4885><s%> of our heart <S%H3820><s%> is ceased <S%H7673><s%>; our dance <S%H4234><s%> is turned <S%H2015><s%> into mourning <S%H60><s%>.
The crown <S%H5850><s%> is fallen <S%H5307><s%> from our head <S%H7218><s%>: woe <S%H188><s%> unto us <S%H2398><s%>, that we have sinned!
For this our heart <S%H3820><s%> is faint <S%H1739><s%>; for these things our eyes <S%H5869><s%> are dim <S%H2821><s%>.
Because of the mountain <S%H2022><s%> of Zion <S%H6726><s%>, which is desolate <S%H8074><s%>, the foxes <S%H7776><s%> walk upon it <S%H1980><s%>.
You <S%H3068><s%>, O Lord, remain <S%H3427><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%>; your throne <S%H3678><s%> from generation <S%H1755><s%> to generation <S%H1755><s%>.
Therefore do you forget <S%H7911><s%> us for ever <S%H5331><s%>, and forsake <S%H5800><s%> us so long <S%H753><s%> time <S%H3117><s%>?
Turn <S%H7725><s%> us unto you <S%H3068><s%>, O Lord, and we shall be turned <S%H7725><s%>; renew <S%H2318><s%> our days <S%H3117><s%> as of old <S%H6924><s%>.
But you have utterly <S%H3988><s%> rejected <S%H3988><s%> us <S%H3966><s%>; you are very angry against us <S%H7107><s%>.
